meanings.definition: Of or resembling a peach in color or texture.
meanings.sent1: The peachy sunset painted the sky in soft hues.
meanings.sent2: Her dress had a peachy color that matched her blush.
meanings.sent3: The peachy walls of the room made it feel cozy and inviting.
meanings.sent4: The peachy clouds drifted lazily across the horizon.
meanings.sent5: The peachy petals of the flower were velvety to the touch.

meanings.sent1: The peachy weather made the picnic even more enjoyable.
meanings.sent2: She did a peachy job on her school project and got an A+.
meanings.sent3: The peachy surprise party left him speechless with joy.
meanings.sent4: Her peachy voice filled the room with warmth and happiness.
meanings.sent5: The peachy vacation by the beach was a dream come true.
